definition[0]: to stick something to something else using glue
example[0]: A notice had been pasted to the door.
definition[1]: to make words that you have removed or copied appear in a new place on a computer screen
example[1]: Data can be pasted into word processing documents.
definition[2]: a soft thick mixture that can easily be shaped or spread
example[2]: Mix the powder with enough water to make a smooth paste.
definition[3]: a type of glue that is used for sticking paper onto things
definition[4]: pieces of glass that are used in jewellery to look like valuable stones
